```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(gridExtra)
```


```{r}
data <- read.csv("../Sanger_Data/Transect_Seqs/Poc_Transect_Seqs.csv")

```

```{r}
RA <- data %>%
  group_by(mtORF.ID) %>%
  summarise(Count = n()) %>% 
  mutate(freq=Count/sum(Count))%>% 
  mutate(Site="Manava")



RA.plot <- RA %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = Site, y = freq, fill = mtORF.ID)) +
  geom_col() +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("gray", "#0072B2","#D55E00", "#009E73", "#009E73","#E69F00","#CC79A7"))+
  theme_bw() +
  ylab("Relative Abundance") +
  xlab("Site")
RA.plot


```
